name: Destructive Dice!
description:
Man, I'm so bored... Why not throw a giant dice on this tilted street?

Let's see how many damages we can cause!

Controls
  • A, D, Left or Right Arrows: Move around
  • W or Up Arrow: Accelerate
  • S or Down Arrow: Brake
Credits
  • Game by Oscar Moreno (Asdonaur)
  • Music from the Reckless Punk-Metal Music Pack, by DavidKBD
  • Sounds used:
    • https://freesound.org/people/Eponn/sounds/420356/
    • https://freesound.org/people/Gemesil/sounds/545692/
    • https://freesound.org/people/GameAudio/sounds/220173/
    • https://freesound.org/people/victorium183/sounds/476816/
